code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./Newcollection.css';import Item from'../Items/Item';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Newcollection=()=>{const[new_collection,setNew_collection]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('http://localhost:4000/newcollections').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setNew_collection(data));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"new-collection",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"NEW COLLECTION"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"collection",children:new_collection.map((item,i)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Item,{name:item.name,image:item.image,new_price:item.new_price,old_price:item.old_price},i);})})]});};export default Newcollection;
